mapper.select: select * from rent_history r, locker l where history_index = #{historyIndex} and r.locker_id = l.locker_id
mapper.insert: insert into review(review_num, user_code, history_index, locker_id, content, score) values(review_num.nextval, #{userCode}, #{historyIndex}, #{lockerId}, #{content}, #{score})
mapper.select: select * from(select rownum as rn, v.* from(select r.rent_cost, r.history_index, r.rent_start, r.rent_end, r.review_yn, l.locker_title, l.locker_content, l.locker_image, l.img_to_clob, l.user_code, l.locker_password from rent_history r, locker l where r.user_code = #{userCode} and r.locker_id = l.locker_id order by r.rent_start desc) v where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select * from(select rownum as rn, v.* from(select r.*, m.nick, l.locker_image, l.img_to_clob, l.locker_title from review r, locker l, member m where m.user_code = l.user_code and r.locker_id = l.locker_id and r.user_code = #{userCode} and r.deleteyn = 'N' order by update_date desc) v where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}

select r.*, l.locker_image, l.img_to_clob, l.locker_title, h.rent_start, h.rent_end from review r, locker l, rent_history h where l.locker_id = r.locker_id and r.history_index = h.history_index and r.review_num = #{reviewNum}

select * from( select rownum as rn, v.* from(select r.*, m.nick, l.locker_image, l.img_to_clob, l.locker_title from review r, member m, locker l where m.user_code = r.user_code and r.locker_id = l.locker_id and r.locker_id = #{lockerId} and r.deleteyn = 'N' order by update_date desc) v where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} -1) * #{amount}
